content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to find the best hiking route for the Brno Reservoir trail. The search results provided a blog post with a detailed description of the trail, including a map and recommended route. The post suggests starting at the Veveří Castle and following the blue marked route along the reservoir's western side. The hike takes about five hours and offers stunning views of the reservoir. The post also advises bringing plenty of water and snacks as there are no facilities along the way.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "question": "What is the best route to take on the Brno Reservoir trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Error: No text to summarize\n\nLinks: []', type='action_result')]
"""
